item.description:
Climbing gear, sleeping bag, tent, clothing suitable for climbing and variable weather, swim suit, towel, toiletries, water, food, snacks, liquor is an essential part of the crag pack. Hannafords food mart is up there.

As always it’s a pot luck dinner

For those that are staying over, it’s a $15.00 per person per night campground fee.

plan on leaving Friday night we will meet at Wellington train station at 7PM

And those that are driving up on Saturday, we’ll meet you at the main parking lot at 900 am.

the directions are, rt93 north to exit 26 take rt25 west to Rumney, follow rt25 to the rotary stay on rt25 west, the polar caves will be on the left. follow rt25 till you see the sign for Rumney village (double blinking yellow lights over head) take that right onto main st, go over a bridge take that left at the church which is Buffalo rd,

about 1 miles on the right you will come to the parking lot for climbing at Rumney.

if you have a GPS use this address 410 buffalo rd Rumney NH
item.how_to_find_us: friday night wellington station lowwer parking lot. saturday morning main parking lot rumney NH
item.name: Rumney Camping Climbing Memorial day weekend
